title: Email download
content:
I have 2 email accounts on Thunderbird, both with the same ISP. I can get messages delivered to the inbox of my main account but Thunderbird no longer searches the server for messages on the secondary account. Both accounts are set up in Thunderbird with identical settings.

I have been online and read the support suggestions on how to resolve this but it hasn't worked. Support suggested it may be that the password has changed and advised me to remove the password from settings and next time I open Thunderbird I will be asked for my password. This did not happen. I removed the password from the account which is not downloading to my inbox and when I reopened Thunderbird I was not asked for the new password. However I can send emails from this secondary account.

I have checked webmail and there are definitely messages waiting there to download.

My main Thunderbird email (the one that is downloading messages to my inbox) is aparbury@comcen.com.au not the one showing on this log in.

He was originally a 'quote request' from about 4 or 5 months ago. It has changed to this name on every quote request email we have on the system, even going back 12 months! I know this is not a TB problem because it has only happened on our laptop, all the quote requests are still showing correct names on TB on our PC. title: Remote access to Thunderbird
content:
I am running thunderbird over an ssh -Y connection on my local LAN. The application runs with no visible (to me) problems, other than those reported in the console window. So, when it starts, it gives some GFX1/glxtest messages which I assume come from the fact that it runs remotely and some numbers reported to glxtest do not make sense (thunderbird runs on a dual GPU laptop, with the nvidia card enabled in performance mode). Then it says it cannot deduce the GPU vendor but I still get normal (if not a bit slow) GUI output.

Then I get console errors mostly from the calendar, which have to do with my google account, but the most worrying one is this one: "Assert failed: Calendar manager initialised calendars before loadCalendarComponent ran on the first 3pane window. This should not happen.\n "

Are they important and can I do something about it? (Screenshot attached)

Thanks for your time!

Nestor
creator: nlouizid

title: Salvataggio allegati pervenuti
content: Buongiorno, utilizzo thunderbird ed ho come sistema operativo Windows 11. Purtroppo tutte le volte che salvo degli allegati che mi sono arrivati, il programma ne salva soltanto uno e poi va subito in crash ed appare il messaggio "il programma non risponde". Per tale ragione devo riaprirlo e procedere nuovamente con il salvataggio che inevitabilmente ,dopo avermi salvato un altro allegato, va nuovamente in crash, e così via fino ad avere esaurito gli allegati. Altre volte (raramente) riesce a salvarli tutti insieme, ma dopo va in crash e devo riaprirlo per continuare a lavorare. Ho provato a risolvere anche con l'aiuto di altri tecnici, ma inutilmente. Siete la mia ultima possibilità di risolvere ! Grazie. Massimo Giuntini
creator: documenti

title: THUNDERBIRD. ricevo le pec da varie persone ma mi appare sempre uno stesso mittente
content: Buongiorno , sono titolare di un account pec professionale. Utilizzo Thunderbird. Da un pò di tempo, nonostante riceva mail da diversi indirizzi, nella pagina iniziale di thunderbird, il mittente mi appare sempre uno solo, ovvero un indirizzo pec di un mio collega (con cui forse, un paio di anni fa ho avuto una corrispondenza). Solo aprendo il contenuto della mail o pec riesco a leggere il reale mittente. Questo fenomeno credo si è verificato dopo un aggiornamento di thunderbird. Se tuttavia controllo le pec dal sito ufficiale (è una pec creata da un ordine professionale credo con aruba) i mittenti sono corretti, ossia i reali indirizzi che mi hanno trasmesso la corrispondenza. Chiedo il vostro aiuto per capire se esiste una procedura per la risoluzione del problema. Attendo vs graditissimo aiuto Cordialmente

Já reinstalei o Thunderbird, já mexi nas configurações e nada! Alguém poderia me dizer como resolver esse problema?

A solicitação é inválida e não pôde ser processada pelo servidor. Não tente novamente. Isso é tudo o que sabemos.

title: Additional frame in search field
content:
I started to learn DevTools for Thunderbird, because I want to fully customize my TB. And I'm stuck with such thing. I want this: <Picture 1> Both search boxes are blue.

For the upper search box is this code snippet responsible:

input { 

 position: absolute;  inset: 0;  width: 100%;  height: 100%;  font-size: 1rem;  border: 1px solid var(--color-gray-40);  border-radius: var(--button-border-radius);  padding-inline: var(--padding-block) var(--search-icon-clearance);  background-color: var(--layout-background-0);

}

So I change it to:

input { 

 position: relative;  inset: 0;  width: 100%;  height: 100%;  font-size: 1rem;  border: 1px solid #82D6FF !important;  border-radius: var(--button-border-radius);  padding-inline: var(--padding-block) var(--search-icon-clearance);  background-color: var(--layout-background-0);

}

And then I have this <Picture 2>


So I get additional frame. But I don't want it. And I can't understand, why I see this additional frame in this place?

Can someone explain me this please?

title: using TB with POP3 to put email into local Inbox folder/file
content:
Been using TB for about one month. When I look at the real Inbox with a text editor, the first two messages received in mid-September have the initial "From" line which separates messages looking like this: 

  From - Thu Sep 12 13:02:54 2024

All the other messages I have received (and stored locally) since then have their initial "From" lines that look like this: 

  From ^M

where my text editor displays a carriage return as ^M (caret cap M). There is no hyphen and there is no timestamp for all the other (later) messages. I have upgraded (recompiled) TB at least a couple of times since those first two messages arrived. In TB everything looks fine, but if I use a different MUA to attempt to read and display the several hundred messages that are in this Inbox, only the first two messages from mid September show up. Could this be a bug? The TB Inbox is formatted in standard mbox format, and should be readable using a different MUA.

Am I missing something? Thank you in advance.

.

creator: eperless

title: TB Local Folders - can no longer see Local Folders and emails
content:
Sometime around Sept 18-19, the Local Folders has become 'hidden' and not fully visible. My wife thinks she chose the 'Hide Local folders' option from the 'folder pane options'. I tried to disable/re-enable that option but Local Folders still do not show, even with that option disabled. There is 1 folder in Favorites that does show it is a sub-folder about 5 levels deep, (although most of the upper level folders will show emails when selected). There are 20+ folders shown in the Recent folders that do show emails as expected. When i select the 'All Folders' option under 'Folder Modes', nothing happens. The display does not change, and when i click back to show the options again, 'All Folders' is NOT selected (even though i just had selected it!).

I read though several topics related to Local Folders, but i do not see this specific issue. I verified the Local Folders directory on Windows does have data (.sbf, MSF, and File) and all the sub-directories. It contains about 4.3GB of data. I tried Copying the actual Local Folders directory on Windows to a new directory, and then changed the Local Folders Account settings configuration to use that new path, however same result, Still cannot see Local Folders entire directory structure. Using TB v128.30.esr. Have it configured to apply updates when available. I saw in the release notes there were updates released on or around Sept 18-19. I initially thought the Local Folders index was corrupted somehow on Windows, so i tried the 'Repair Folder' option on the 5 levels i could see in the 1 Favorite that was showing, especially the top level, however that did not change anything. Since I cannot see the whole Local Folder structure, i cannot try on any other folders. I now suspect there is an issue with 'Hide Local Folders' function. that seems to be what has caused all this.

will attach screen caps showing the menu options, and Recents/Favorites. I can provide others if needed. thanks for any guidance. Eric
creator: ericbuckwalter

how should I proceed?

title: Email
content:
I have Thunderbird 128.2.3 (32 bit). I have set Server type IMAP mail server, then Server Name to: outlook.office365.com and Outgoing Server: smtp.office365.com I have OAuth2 on both. When I enter, I get a new Thunderbird input that requires a password. My password does not work, the therefore my email account does not work.

I have confirmed that my Outlook Password is correct. I have cancelled my Outlook passwords. I have installed the 2 step verification option.

What needs to be done so I can use Thunderbird on my PC Win 10? Thank you, Ed

title: The latest TB update (128.3 esr is crashing on Mac's latest update. Please help!!!

It still crashes the minute I click into the program to open an email. I believe my only choice is to go back to an earlier version on time machine and turn off my automatic update. Any suggestions? Interestingly enough, I can still get my email on my iPhone running 17.6.1.
